neighborhood_overview:
Strategically located in the Parc del Fòrum, a spacious area where all kinds of music festivals and events are held throughout the year.
The CCIB (Barcelona Internation Convention Center) is just down the road,
Go over the road and cut through the park and you will arrive at the Port Forum Marina, and the beautiful Platja del Forum beach, surrounded by beautiful parks, a lovely spacious area for walking, cycling...
The Forum bathing area on the other side of the beach has wheelchair access for bathing.
The tram (just outside the apartment) & Metro (5 minutes walk) takes you everywhere, very quickly and conveniently into the city center and other areas of Barcelona.
The area is great for people wanting to stay away from the busy touristy areas of Barcelona, but accessible within minutes.

neighborhood_overview: When we are in Barcelona we go first to the market La Boqueria a bit further up on the other side of the Rambla. There we see shows at a very reasonable price that are mostly a bit weird, but we never forget them very quickley.

neighborhood_overview:
The Raval quarter is located between the left side of the Eixample and the Gótico quarters. It is one of the quarters with more changes in the last years, going from a very popular neighbourhood to a dynamic area where restorers, designers, architects and artists have chosen it a place to settle, making the quarter one of the most dynamic, trendy and multi-ethnical ones of the city, yet without losing its popular charm.

The Museum of Contemporary Art (MACBA), the Centre of Contemporary Culture (CCCB), and the Universities have eased the change of a marginal area to a cosmopolitan one, becoming a reference for all the city.

In the Raval the old and the modern blend naturally; for this we can see how the neighbourhood enjoys all type of facilities, from the most modern ones to the lifelong stores –the great markets of the Boquería or Sant Antoni. Therefore, the traditional, the modern, and the alternative coexist in this quarter in permanent evolution.

neighborhood_overview:
The Gothic Quarter is the historic centre of the old city of Barcelona. It stretches from La Rambla to Via Laietana, and from the Mediterranean seafront to the Ronda de Sant Pere.

The quarter encompasses the oldest parts of the city of Barcelona, and includes the remains of the city's Roman wall and several notable medieval landmark.

The Barri Gòtic retains a labyrinthine street plan, with many small streets opening out into squares. Most of the quarter is closed to regular traffic.

And one last thing, the Gothic Quarter is not actually much Gothic but neo-Gothic (but that's a different story).

El Casco Viejo es el lugar perfecto en la ciudad con muchas opciones culturales, turisticas y gastronomía. Estupendo situado en el corazón de la ciudad y también con fácil acceso al transporte público.
Al lado del Mercado de la Ribera, que con sus 10.000 m2, lo convierte en el mayor mercado cubierto de Europa. Podréis hacer vuestras compras y, además, disfrutar de unos magníficos pintxos, en su zona de restauración.

Y así será también, como podréis descubrir todo el Centro Histórico del Botxo. La Catedral de Santiago, la Plaza Nueva, corazón del Casco antiguo, llena bares de moda y tradicionales, tiendas y comercios. Se funde lo más típico con lo más moderno. Todo a un paso.

Hay un supermercado justo saliendo a la izquierda, donde comprar lo necesario para vuestra estancia.

neighborhood_overview:

Personal sanitario

Viajeros que quieren volver a su lugar de origen y se ven afectados por las interrupciones en el transporte

Personas que deban asistir y cuidar a mayores, menores, dependientes, personas con discapacidad o personas especialmente vulnerables

Trabajadores que prestan un servicio esencial y tienen permitido desarrollar su actividad durante el estado de alarma

Casos en situación de necesidad o causa de fuerza mayor.

name: Las casas de EA Astei - Sabai
description:
El Sabai hoy en día ha sido cuidadosamente restaurado con madera de abeto para convertirse en un diáfano espacio de 95 metros cuadrados que integra una cocina, salón con chimenea y una cama de matrimonio , junto otra habitación con cama doble.

The space
El granero o Sabai era antiguamente en la estructura original del caserío Astei el lugar donde se guardaba la hierba seca para alimentar a los animales, acorde con el modo de vida típicamente rural vasco de antaño, dedicado fundamentalmente a la agricultura y ganadería.

El Sabai hoy en día ha sido cuidadosamente restaurado con madera de abeto para convertirse en un diáfano espacio de 95 metros cuadrados que integra una cocina, salón con chimenea y una cama de matrimonio flanqueada por dos antiguos costureros y un cabecero pintado del siglo XVIII sobre la que pende una lámpara de bronce antigua.

Un amplio ventanal del techo al suelo permite disfrutar de las vistas de los montes y los t

name: Las Casas de Ea: Preciosa Garaixe
description:
If we could go back in time to the sixteenth century and stroll through the fields of Euskadi, we would enjoy the sight of numerous raised
barns of Garaixes, formerly very common in the villages of the eastern valleys of Vizcaya.

The space
These outbuildings, called "garaixes" were the traditional village barns, built high on stone stilts to keep the wheat, fruits and meats
out of reach of the animals and to provide dry storage.

The Garaixe of Astei is built in larch wood, in imitation of the original barn, and is now a cozy cottage of 35 square meters with integrated
kitchen and bathroom, perfect for couples who want to enjoy themselves in a unique setting. The barn is lined with oak shelves and walls, and
collections of antique plates decorated with scenes of villages and cups with different Basque motives evoke ancient times.

The high level bedroom is decorated with artwork of artist and academic Erramun Landa whic
neighborhood_overview: We have beautiful paths around the houses where our guests enjoy magnificent walks through nature listening to the thrill of birds that fly above our heads.

The space
La vanguardia se alía con la tradición en un nuevo concepto de edificio en el corazón de Euskadi. Una casa de 180 metros cuadrados, con tres habitaciones, tres baños y un gran salón, construida con la más moderna tecnología y medioambientalmente responsable puesto que genera su propia energía, ofrece un alto nivel de confort y una decoración moderna y agradable.

Los tonos blancos y tostados contrastan con el verde intenso de los robles y eucaliptos que inundan el salón a través de sus espectaculares ventanales con vistas a una terraza entretejida de madera que flota en la naturaleza.

name: Ondarreta beach San Sebastian
description:
Bright and spacious flat with lift, 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms at the Ondarreta beach, including a safe underground parking in the same building. Located in a quiet and perfectly communicated residential area.
The price is all included.

The space
Splendid apartment with Wi-Fi, only 100 metres fom Ondarreta Beach.

The apartment is in the 4th floor of a modern building with elevator in a safe residential area, surrounded by gardens and with a convenient parking place for your car in the same building, included. It has a living room, kitchen, three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The main bedroom has twin beds and "en-suite" bathroom. The second bedroom, has two beds with a view to a garden.The third bedroom has a queen size bed. All the bedrooms have cupboards.

Being in the fourth floor, it is a very luminous apartment; two of the bedrooms and the living room and the kitchen look out onto a peaceful street. Individual heating system.
neighborhood_overview:
Situated in a residential area, you can find all kind of facilities around, bars where you can taste the traditional basque pintxos, miniature basque haute cuisine, luxury restaurants, 4 and 5 star rated hotels, drugstores, medical center, supermarkets and convenience stores. Close by you can find one of the most comercial streets in San Sebastián where you can find everything you might need.

Close to the university campus and the International Nanotechnology Centre, you can walk to Monte Igueldo and get a cable train to its legendary fun park, one of the oldest in Europe and where you will enjoy the most amazing views of the city and its surroundings. You can also walk to Miramar Palace or either visit El Peine del Viento (The Comb of the Wind), and the wonderful iron-wrougth structures which seem to emerge from the sea.

Aquí se celebran también el Festival de Cine, el Festival de Jazz, los conciertos de Semana Grande, la Quincena musical... a los que hay que añadir el variado programa cultural del auditorio Kursaal. Y los amantes del deporte, sin duda, disfrutarán de las posibilidades que ofrece el entorno: surf, Camino de Santiago, bicicleta, piragua...

Podréis visitar:
- Cueva de Pozalagua: Os recomendamos la visita a esta hermosa cueva (mejor Rincón de España 2013). A simple vista os puede parecer una más, pero lo que hace a esta tan especial y por lo que se la considera una de las mejores del mundo es por sus estalactitas excéntricas ya que desafiando a la gravedad se curvan, crecen hacía arriba y se entrelazan formando auténticas marañas.

- Centro de interpretación del parque Natural de Armañón: Interesante centro visual de nuestra naturaleza más cercana. Hermosas vistas de Armañón y impresionate proyección.

- Karpin Aventura: Parque de recuperación de la fauna en el que además de preocuparse por la fauna y la naturaleza, podremos disfrutar de:

- ANIMALIA, TERRASAURO, GASTORNISLAND, CHAVARRI JAUREGIA, DINOTXIKI.

neighborhood_overview:
ENTORNO DEL ALOJAMIENTO

A pie de playa. Zona de Surf. Bares/cafeterias.

El barrio de Gros,separado del Centro y de la Parte Vieja por el Río Urumea, está delimitado al Norte por el mar Cantábrico, al este por el Monte Ulía y al Oeste por el Río Urumea y el Palacio de Congresos Kursaal. Dos puentes le separan del centro de la ciudad, haciendo patente su cercanía respecto del mismo.
En Gros se encuentra la Playa de Zurriola, la más joven de las tres playas donostiarras, concurrida por los amantes y profesionales del Surf. La distancia que separa esta playa de La Concha no es superior a 15 minutos a pie.
Al final del paseo de la Zurriola en las faldas del Monte Ulía, se encuentra Sagües, una zona de Gros que ha sido conquistada por los más jóvenes y en donde encontramos una zona de viviendas y bares de copas y pintxos, junto a un gran paseo y zona de esparcimiento, todo ello situado frente al mar.

neighborhood_overview:
Torroella de Fluviá is a small peaceful rural village located a short drive from the beach (about 4 km). The immensely long beach of Sant Pere is famous for its beauty and (in designated areas) as a wind surfing, surfing, and kite surfing venue.

Sant Marti de Empuries offers a series of more protected coves adjacent to the Roman ruins of Empuries and the picturesque hamlet of Sant Marti.

Our house is a minute's walk from a great local shop. Fresh bread and newspapers in the morning, good local produce (including organic products) and most essential items. A village bar/restaurant in the town square offers great lunch options and small plates at all times. Or you can sit in the sun while the kids play safely.

The neighbouring village of Sant Pere Pescador offers a good range of shops including a largish supermarket. There are also restaurants for every pocket and taste in Sant Pere. See our guide book for some favourites.

name: CAN FELIP - Ático loft del s.XVIII
description:
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”

The space
Magnífica casa de pueblo del siglo XVIII, ubicado en el centro de la villa de Palafrugell. La casa ha sido totalmente rehabilitada y dividida en 3 apartamentos “Can Felip”: -Piso 1: 156m2 + 33 de terraza. -Piso 2: 114 m2 + 70m2 de preciosa terraza soleada a 4 vientos. -Piso Ático: 76m2 + 47 de fabulosa terraza privada a 3 vientos.

Todas las habitaciones son grandes y frescas. Estas disponen de un ventilador en verano y calefacción en invierno.

“Can Felip” se encuentran situados en el centro del pueblo de Palafrugell a 50 metros de la Iglesia y del Mercado. En una zona tranquila con agradables vistas, situada en el corazón del “Baix Empordà” (Costa Brava).

A 3 Km de las fantásticas playas de Calella de Palafrugell, Llafranc y Tamariu.
neighborhood_overview:
Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial.

El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.

neighborhood_overview: Palafrugell se remonta al siglo X. El núcleo antiguo, conserva aún hoy algo de su trazado urbanístico medieval, encabezado por la iglesia de Sant Martí y formado por un conjunto de calles y callejones que configuran un gran centro comercial. El máximo desarrollo de la localidad se produjo a finales del siglo XVIII con el inicio de la producción de tapones de corcho, hecho que aún hoy es evidente en la arquitectura local, con las fábricas de corcho y los edificios modernistas de la época. En el Museo del Corcho podrá conocer más a fondo esta industria.A pie o en bicicleta, y a tu ritmo, explora tanto como desees, por la extensa red de 350km de caminos que hay actualmente en la Costa Brava, por los arrozales, o por las dunas de la playa de Pals a través de miradores privilegiados sobre el mar o bien por los yacimientos del Empordà... y, por supuesto, por los caminos de ronda: un impresionante paseo que acaricia el mar entre acantilados y que une todas las playas de la Costa Brava.

neighborhood_overview:

Diving (various marine reserves), nautic sports, tennis and various golf courses (one PGA) are available close by.
Gastronomy quality of the area is well known, and you'll find a large variety of restaurants in Begur and its surroundings.

It's so nice to have dinner at the balcony as it has a little view to the sea. We love to sleep in the sofa bed because we can catch a glimpse of the stunning sunrise all throughout the year. It's cozy and just right if you're looking for a quiet escapade but not if you're looking for something as a luxury. What you see in the pictures is what you get.
There are restaurants and supermarket near the apartment.

The space
The apartment is just 1 minute away from the beach La Fosca of Palamós. It has one bedroom with 2 built-in cabinets, 1 bathroom, kitchen with stove and balcony for the washing machine, salon with sofa-bed and an ample balcony overseeing the sea. It can accommodate up to 4 persons. So if you plan to have a quiet vacation far from the maddening crowd this apartment is ideal for you!

The parking is included, the lot is spacious and inside the compound so it is pretty safe.

There's a high season price for the months of July,
neighborhood_overview: La Fosca is a small, quiet beach and not that crowded like that of Palamós center. There are restaurants and supermarket close by. The Castell beach is also near. One can pleasant have a walk and contemplate the beauty of the beach.

name: Masía en el parque natural de la Garrotxa
description:
NUESTRA ACOGEDORA CASA ESTA DENTRO DEL PARQUE NATURAL DE LA ZONA VOLCANICA DE LA GARROTXA Y A CINCO MINUTOS DE OLOT. TIENE TRES HABITACIONES CON BAÑO EN SU INTERIOR, COCINA, UN AMPLIO SALON CON CHIMENEA Y BARBACOA EN EL JARDIN

The space

Es uno de los lugares más bonitos del Parque, combina bosques, pastos y algunos caseríos aislados con chozas y muros de piedra seca de roca volcánica. En este paraje de múltiples leyendas es donde se originaron los primeros volcanes, ahora solo testimoniados por diferentes coladas de lava, ya enfriadas y superpuestas una encima de la otra, que configuran un relieve suave.
A cinco minutos del famoso Hayedo d’en Jordà, Volcán Santa Margarita, Volcán Croscat y la Ciudad de Olot.

name: Quiet times by the riverside
description:

name: Medieval castle S.X - the tower apartment
description:
In the center of the Ripollès between rivers, valleys and mountains stands magnificently ancient castle Llaés (sX). A unique place of exceptional beauty, where there is absolute tranquility amidst lush nature.
The apartment is distributed from a distributor hall with an old well, which gives way to the whole, with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, dining room, living room and a kitchen equipped with a terrace with wonderful views of the immensity of nature.

The space
With over 1000 years of history, Llaés castle has been renovated to enjoy the accommodations in family and / or friends.
We do not offer anything extraordinary, since everything here is quite natural, we will invite you to the castle and its history, to know the corners of the surroundings, waterfalls, ancient house in caves, the uniqueness of the "Bufadors" forest...

Welcome!

neighborhood_overview: In the town of Llaés we are 12 inhabitants, and what we like the most about our neighborhood, the tranquility and harmony that is breathed, the green of the mountains with the contrast of the electric blue of the sky. We love quiet afternoons where just looking up you see eagles, owls at dusk, butterflies, hares, moles, foxes, and countless more neighbors running around the neighborhood!

name: Can Portell by 123ole: the Pink Box 2 pers
description:
The space
Bed & Breakfast 123ole, Can Portell” has both the sea and mountains on its doorstep, is not far from the vibrant town of Girona, and only half an hour’s drive from the airport. Not only is it easy to get to, but Can Portell caters to everyone’s needs.
The house is an old masia farm and dates from 1690. The main building is surrounded by a beautiful plot of land with a swimming pool, stables, trees that provide shade and an original, abandoned corral where we now keep our horses. The house comes complete with a truly unique décor, intriguing corridors, steps, rooms aplenty and a charming veranda – the perfect spot for a morning coffee, for reading the papers and for surveying the garden. This is where you will be served breakfast, and the occasional dinner if you so desire. The shady area underneath the veranda, furnished with loungers, offers cool relaxation.
Each season here has its own charm and beauty, so our doors are open to guests all year round.

neighborhood_overview: Rocabruna is a small entity in the municipality of Camprodon, located in the Alta Garrotxa, a space of Natural interest. description:
The space

Supermarkets, bars and restaurants are a 5 minute walk.
In Rosas, a 10 minute drive by car, there are all kinds of shops, restaurants and other entertainment.

The coastal path underneath the house allows for hiking, for experts to Cadaqués through the nature reserve of Cap Creus, or to L'Escala.

Other suggestions for excursions are Figueres with the Dali museum, the ruins of Empuries, the Aiguamolls parc.

Other possibly activities include snorkeling, diving, tennis (in L'Almadrava Park Hotel), pitch & putt and golf.

The best part, of course, is to come back to the appartment and enjoy the terrace with the best view in town!

Just a few meters away from Gran Via Metro Station and about 5 minutes walking from the city´s "0 kilometer " in the Puerta del Sol. Absolute centre of the capital, the most historic but also modern, the most tourist but at the same time the most crowded by locals.


A few minutes walk form this apartment is enough to reach the most visited places in the city. Emblematic points such as the Plaza Mayor, Palacio Real and Gran Vía –Madrid´s Broadway Street, just one block away-.

Worldwide known museums such as Reina Sofía, Prado or Thyssen Bornemisza, and the main park : El Retiro . Everything within walking distance! And of course this is an area where you´ll find the best and most typical restaurants, bars and shops.

The perfect place if you´re willing to get to know Madrid´s essence.

neighborhood_overview: La ubicación de este apartamento es ideal para recorrer a pie los lugares de interés turístico e histórico más significativos de Madrid. Otra opción es coger un autobús que hace recorridos turísticos por la ciudad. A sólo 200 m. empieza la Plaza de España, que a su vez es la entrada a la zona verde mayor de Madrid. A su izquierda se encuentran los 2 jardines del Palacio Real: ”Sabatini” y “Campo del Moro”, y a la derecha encuentrarás el “Templo de Debod” y el “Parque del Oeste”, donde podrás coger el teleférico desde el cual se ve Madrid desde lo alto

neighborhood_overview:
La Latina / Embajadores
From: https://www.timeout.com/coolest-neighbourhoods-in-the-world
Embajadores
neighbourhoods to visit in 2018
The coolest neighbourhood in the world 2018 is Embajadores, Madrid
Madrid might be the world’s most exciting capital right now, and Embajadores is its most colourful neighbourhood. This is a place where people from near and far live side by side, cooking up a bustling cultural life. To the north, Plaza Tirso de Molina is the territory of florists by day, and at night fills with young revellers queuing to get into Medias Puri, the city’s club of the moment. To the south are Tabacalera and La Casa Encendida, two huge cultural centres standing like transatlantic vessels run ashore in the middle of the city. You can dine on Indian specialities served atop a flowery oilcloth, or get a divine Moroccan lamb tagine for an absurdly low price. Nightlife and street life, street art and high culture, food and people from across the world:

neighborhood_overview:
The nickname -Malasaña- neighborhood will come following the street dedicated in 1879 to the family and since 1961 Malasaña young seamstress Manuela Malasaña, killed by Napoleon's troops during the days of repression subsequent to the lifting of May 2, 1808 on charges of "bear arms" to bring a sewing scissors when she was arrested. His body was buried in the Hospital of the Good Bliss on the street Silva.
At the heart of the neighborhood is Plaza Dos de Mayo, which was the former site of Artillery Monteleón, where they were quartered against "francesada" the little military force that took up arms against the Napoleonic army, under the command two captains Pedro Velarde and Luis Daoiz. In the remodeled square arch of old barracks it remains. Other typical neighborhood squares are, for example, San Ildefonso and Santa Maria Soledad Torres Acosta.

The apartment is located in a lively, dynamic area, with a wide range of leisure and culture and where you will find numerous tapas bars, restaurants, theaters and shops.

The neighborhood has a strong local character thanks to its beautiful architecture and the presence of traditional shops of which it is possible to enjoy simply walking through its colorful streets.

neighborhood_overview:

From here you can reach the gastronomic area of Ponzano and the always lively Plaza de Olavide with its terraces.

A little further on is Calle Fuencarral, full of shops and cinemas.

If you like culture, the Pintor Sorolla Museum is just around the corner and the Archaeological Museum and the National Library are only a 15 minute walk away.

If you are passing through and are going to continue your travels in Spain, don't hesitate to let me know, as I know it very well and I can recommend amazing places in almost every major city in Spain.

I will be happy to make recommendations to make your stay in Madrid and in Spain, unforgettable.

description:

The space

The flat consists of two bedrooms, one which has views to the street and the other is an interior bedroom. Both have standard double beds (135cm x 190cm). It's a south-facing flat with lots of natural light.

The (very small) kitchen and bathroom were renovated in November 2014 and in December 2016 a new electrical system was installed which includes USB chargers in each bedroom behind the night tables. The flat is located in the city centre, and as such, space is at a premium. Please do
neighborhood_overview:
This city centre flat is located in arty, bohemian, multi-cultural Lavapiés which is walking distance to 'the Art Triangle' of El Reina Sofia Museum, The Prado, and The Thyssen. All other major attractions are walkable such as La Plaza Mayor, Royal Palace, Sol, El Parque del Retiro, El Rastro Flea Market etc. Lavapiés is great for tapas bars and Indian Restaurants as well as independent theatres and art galleries. There is a lively bar scene from rock, soul, and jazz to gay & lesbian. There is also a burgeoning coffee shop scene, most with free Wi-Fi and books for sale. This is a multi-cultural and safe area but if cultures/colours other than your own bother you, then perhaps Lavapies isn't for you. The flat is tucked away in a quieter back street (no bars). It's south facing and very sunny. The main bedroom has a view of the street.

The JESUS DEL VALLE apartment is located in the heart of the Malasaña district, the alternative, bohemian neighbourhood in Madrid. It is a few steps away from Gran Vía and the calle Fuencarral, the trendy pedestrian shopping street that divides the Malasaña and Chueca districts. The neighborhood has lots of great outdoor cafés, tapas bars, Spanish restaurants, and trendy coffee shops. This area is becoming pedestrianized, so providing a unique place to stroll in this attractive and vibrant city that invites you to wander through its streets.
Public transportation is only a few meters away allowing you to easily and quickly get to all of Madrid's main tourist spots. Nearest tube stations: Gran Vía (line 1), Noviciado (line 2), Plaza de España (line 3), San Bernardo (line 4), Callao (line 5), Tribunal (line 10). neighborhood_overview:
Malasaña is to the west of Chueca and to the east of Argüelles. It is surrounded by several metro stations and is a central neighbourhood of Madrid. Residents include Esperanza Aguirre, the former Governor of the Province of Madrid, amongst other politicians and several artists. It was the center of the movida movement in late 1970s and 1980s Madrid.

Malasaña is a vibrant neighborhood full of lively bars and clubs overflowing with young people. Its streets are currently being renovated, making it a much more attractive quarter. It's one of the classic areas for partying the night away. The area's center is the Plaza del Dos de Mayo (in commemoration of a popular uprising on May 2, 1808, brutally repressed by the French troops and which started the Spanish Independence War).

neighborhood_overview:
You gotta love it, Madrid’s Malasaña neighbourhood. It’s trendy and teeming with hipsters, but laid-back at the same time. A creative hub that’s always alive and kicking. From early morning to late at night, colourful Madrileños talk on street corners and walk their dogs between tattoo parlours and barbershops.

There are many reasons to love this neighbourhood. Here, our lovely Madrid local Brian lists five of them.

1.- The colourful and unpolished streets
Just navigating the streets of this neighbourhood is food for the senses. You’ll feel a local and urban vibe that’s both refreshing and inspiring. Lamp posts are covered in colourful stickers, while façades, street corners and shop shutters are clad in street art.

A large number of dogs frequent these streets, their owners enjoying the sunny weekends with cold beers and gourmet burgers at the small squares. Unpolished and authentic, Malasaña has an addictive atmosphere that will make you come bac

neighborhood_overview:
Built between 1910 and 1929, Gran Vía is Madrid’s most famous street and house of numerous restaurants, bars, all types of shops, cinemas and theaters and some of the capital's most iconic buildings.

Gran Via is one of the streets with the most exciting nightlife in Madrid, the street that never sleeps. Some of the most famous buildings in the country can be found here, such as the Metropolis building or the Carrion building with its popular Schweppes sign.

It is also one of the most important shopping streets and house of Primark’s second largest shop in the world, along with other well-known brands like Zara, Loewe, H&M, Sfera, Nike and Adidas.

There is no shortage of events at Gran Via. You can watch the Lion King, Les Miserables or simply go for a live flamenco performance; with many great restaurants in the are you can experience the authentic Spanish gastronomy or enjoy a drink in the bars or rooftops while enjoying beautiful views and its popul

name: Grande maison de charme
description:
Maison de caractère datant de la fin du 19ème siècle. Entourée d’un grand jardin de 3000m2 arboré, elle dispose d' un vaste « patio » ombragé. A proximité immédiate des plages et des commodités urbaines. Quartier vivant et calme

The space
Cette maison est dans notre famille depuis 1907. Elle a été récemment climatisée pour les 4 chambres du 1er étage et les deux salons du rez-de-chuassée ; par ailleurs la grande hauteur sous plafond (4m30 au rdc et au 1er) la qualité des sols (marbres et azulejos), l'air de la mer tout proche la rendent très agréable même au coeur de l'été.
Des motifs picturaux de la première décennie du 20ème siècle ornent les murs et les plafonds. Un patio ombragé et calme accueillera vos temps de repas et de repos à l'arrière de la maison.

Guest access
Les voyageurs ont accès à la totalité de la maison y compris au piano à queue du salon de musique. La salle à manger peut accueillir une douzaine de convives. I
neighborhood_overview:
L’ancien village de pêcheurs de El Palo s’est peu à peu urbanisé et est devenu un quartier « normal » de la ville. Ce jardin en pleine zone urbaine est resté un espace de calme privilégié. Beaucoup d'autres propriétés similaires ont depuis 20 ans, été loties en "casas adosadas"(maisons de ville avec jardin et piscine).
Les plages du Palo, Pedregalejo et Las Acacias (à 500m de la maison) sont des plages urbaines de sable gris. Des criques artificielles ont été aménagées depuis 15 ans. Ces plages sont longées pendant 3km d'une promenade (le paseo marítimo) plantée de palmiers et bordée de quantité de "merenderos", petits restaurants de plein air et ombragés où l'on peut manger bien à des prix abordables. Elles sont nettoyées tous les jours. Il y a peu de tourisme "étranger", surtout des familles espagnoles et les habitants de Málaga. Les touristes séjournent plutôt à l'ouest de la ville vers Torremolinos et au-delà. Le quartier est très agréable, avec la montagne juste derrière e

The space

The criterion to be followed is to make the most of the existing trimmings to place the furniture, which grows vertically to avoid a large amount of floor occupation.
The furniture is designed to be flexible and easily interchangeable.
The bathroom, kitchen and living-dining room are located in the lower part and the bedroom on the upper floor.

A 50m walk leads to the Plaza de la Merced, which sports bars, cafes and restaurants of all kind and is a very nice hangout.

Passing Plaza de la Merced, you enter the pedestrian zone, which defines the whole inner city of Málaga, with its numerous bars and restaurants, shops and tea houses, museums and squares, old castle, roman theatre and turkish baths.

name: Quiet rooftop apartment city centre

The space

An impressive penthouse is situated in the historic centre of Málaga city, it’s both modern and light-filled and benefits from a very spacious terrace. Be it for business or pleasure, this impressive penthouse is centrally located and within walking distance to some of Malaga’s best amenities. From the vast array of museums (Picasso, Thyssen, CAC), to the golden sandy beaches of “La Malagueta”, Malaga has something for everyone. Or be it, taking a coffee opposite the UNESCO protected Anfiteatro and its neighbouring La Alcazaba, or sampling a tapa in Plaza de Obispo in the shadow of the towering Catedral “La Manquita”. Malaga has it all!

neighborhood_overview:
The penthouses’ superb location in being beside Calle Larios, this flat is newly furnished and decorated in a classic style with all the modern appliances you could ever want. With large double glazed windows and air conditioning you will be able to relax in comfort.

Due to its central location, you can take a stroll down to some of the best shopping available in Malaga. As one of the most exclusive retail areas in all of Spain, you are situated right in the heart of a mecca of high end establishments that criss-cross Calle Larios and Calle Nueva. Leading brands such as Zara, Massimo Dutti, Benetton, Mango and many more internationally renowned brands dot these exquisitely stylish streets. Whilst on your shopping expedition, take a moment to visit the revamped municipal market (Atarazanas) for some of Andalucia’s freshest fruit and vegetable stalls. And whilst there, sample the daily fish caught that’s on offer in one of the tapas bars.

This quiet house is perfect for 6 people with its three rooms, 2 with queen size bed and one with 2 single beds.
In the cozy living room, you will enjoy the fresh air, thanks to a typical Majorcan architecture aimed to fight the hot climate.
In the traditional kitchen, you will prepare el gazpacho, the cold veg soup, or enjoy the delicious specialties of the island, the einseimadas or the chorizo.

In the evenings, you will witness one of the most extraordinary night sky, and in the morning, the charming traditional village will slowly wake up with the sounds of the roosters, letting you enjoy the beautiful color

As it is a centenary building, it has no lift. Right next to it, you will find Grand Hotel, a Lluís Domènech i Montaner's architectural masterpiece from 1903. Gran Hotel dazzles all visitors who make their way from La Rambla to Passeig del Born. The modernist icon that characterizes Gran Hotel façade made this landmark building become a must, as it has always been considered one of the most fascinating buildings in Palma.

Consequently, the location of the apartment is ideal to discover the capital and the rest of the island.

In the coastline, there are restaurants with terraces overlooking the sea and silhouette Cabrera Island that allow fish or enjoy a good “paella”.
For water sports-loving, lies between two Club Náutico of S'Estanyol and Club Náutico of Sa Rapita, both organized sailing lessons, fishing, canoeing ... for children and adults.
3 minutes driving from the beaches, S'Arenal de Sa Rapita, Ses Covetes and 'Es Trenc' Walking through the 3 km of the beach reached the village of Colonia Sant Jordi, more touristy but not less interesting, with weekly market of fruit and vegetables on Wednesday afternoon.
From Colonia Sant Jordi starts a boat for to visit Cabrera Island, National Maritime-Terrestrial Park is also a museum

Train station one minute away, three minutes to town centre, declared of historic-artistic interest. Equidistant from all Mallorca’s best beaches, at the foot the Serra de Tramontana mountains (recently endowed with World Heritage status); possibility of hiking and walking excursions. Twenty-five minutes by train from capital, Palma de Mallorca and ten minutes from market town, Inca.

English speaking owner, professional organiser of cultural events, will be happy to help you plan your best Mallorquin holiday, and has two bicycles to lend.

neighborhood_overview: Villa Bonnix is located between Pollensa and Alcudia very close to Puerto Pollensa and Puerto Alcudia. Pollensa is a town and municipality situated in the far north corner of the island of Mallorca. Most houses were built in the 17th and 18th centuries and many streets are very narrow and compact, a legacy from the medieval era. The central square has numerous outdoor cafés and is dominated by a large 13th century church. Puerto Pollensa is situated in the north eastern corner on the island of Mallorca only 45 minutes from Palma. Once a small fishing port, now it's an elegant holiday destination in an unspoilt corner of a popular holiday island. Puerto Pollensa nestles in a natural bay, against a backdrop of rugged mountains, giving a particularly picturesque setting. There are stretches of sandy beaches and the wonderful 'Pine Walk' right alongside the seashore where bars, shops and restaurants provide an unbeatable combination. Right next to it, you will find Grand Hotel, a Lluís Domènech i Montaner's architectural masterpiece from 1903. Gran Hotel dazzles all visitors who make their way from La Rambla to Passeig del Born. The modernist icon that characterizes Gran Hotel façade made this landmark building become a must, as it has always been considered one of the most fascinating buildings in Palma.

Consequently, the location of the apartment is ideal to discover the capital and the rest of the island.

The festivities are in late July where valldemossines decorate the streets to worship their patron Saint Catherine Thomas. Chopin, composer and pianist of the nineteenth century, spent much of his life here. The town is also known for its famous 'potato kink' typical local cake and many claim Mallorca. Plenty of celebrities have homes in the area, the neighboring village, Deia is both picturesque, where the British poet Robert Graves found inspiration for his poems. neighborhood_overview:
Our location in the heart of Old Town Palma cannot be beat. Our neighborhood offers the best of all worlds -- plazas, shops, and tapas bar bustle during the day, while night time brings quiet, peaceful streets.
You can enjoy the view of the sunny plaza in front of the building from your window, or go downstairs and enjoy a coffee there. Dining options from inexpensive tapas to Michelin-starred restaurants are a short walk from your home away from home in Palma.

We are within a fifteen-minute walk from any of the important historic sites of the city: the Cathedral, Almudaina Palace, Lonja, City Hall, Gran Hotel, and the beautiful modernist buildings of the city center. We’re also less than ten minutes walking either to Paseo Maritimo, where you can enjoy a ten mile stretch of the oceanside promenade, or Mallorca’s main transportation hub, from which you can explore the rest of the island. neighborhood_overview: The port of Porto Colom is one of the biggest natural harbours in the area. Here is still a very authentic Majorquin atmosphere, away from mass tourism and you´ll find some of the best restaurants. Porto Colom is also an ideal spot to start several excursions. Nearby is the ′Monasterio de San Salvador′ from where you can enjoy panoramic views over the island. The ′Cuevas del Drach′ are an important place to visit and reachable in 20 min drive. In the port there´s a big offer in water sport activities and pleasure boat trips along the beautiful coastline. The animated tourist area of Cala d´Or with its boutiques, bars and restaurants is also just a few km away. And golf lovers find the famous Vall d´Or 18 hole golf course at 4 km. The nearest beach is Cala Marsal at approximately 1km and the idyllic virgin beach of Cala Sanau with it´s unforgettable atmosphere, bamboo sun-loungers and beach bar is reachable in just 10 min by car. There might be life music in the weekend.

description:

El dormitorio principal se encuentra en una planta superior con techo abuhardillado.El baño amplio. El apartamento esta equipado con aire acondicionado, calefaccion y bañera hidromasaje. La terraza, con sus 80 m2, permite, cenar, hacer barbacoa y relajarte en el chill out. Central y practico,el mercado a la vueta de la esquina, tambien el barrio de bares de tapas, se puede visitar la ciudad, cenar, compras, visitar salas de exposiciones y todos sus rincones a pie. Utilizando el transporte publico o coche para poder realizar excursiones por la tramuntana, las estupendas playas etc.Desde el aeropuerto se puede llegar en 15 mn. en bus o taxi. Paradas de bus a la vuelta de la esquina, a todos los destinos de la isla.Buena zona para ir en bici por la ciudad, a cenar, comprar, etc

name: Casa con piscina a las afueras de Palma
description:
The space
Casa de construcción reciente, idealmente situada, en una urbanización en una pequeño monte a las afueras de la ciudad de Palma. No hay proximidad con los vecinos, privacidad absoluta. Pozo natural de agua potable. Agua fría y caliente. Paisaje natural con árboles .Jardín y alrededores de piscina amueblados.

Situada a tan solo 20 min en coche de la ciudad de Palma, ciudad plagada de restaurantes, comercios y vida nocturna. La situación de la casa permite alternar días de descanso y relax con días más intensos en la ciudad. Cabe decir que Mallorca al ser una isla os va a permitir disfrutar de una amplia oferta de playas, de arena, roca grande, roca pequeña, piedras, nudistas, etc... La más cercana se encuentra a 15 min de la casa. En invierno hay muchos pueblos característicos cada uno con una historia particular y que son de obligatoria visita.

La vivienda está totalmente equipada: Cocina Americana, Aire acondicionado (con bomba de calor)

The beach is a just the right size, not massive, but has a lifeguard, lounge chairs for rent and a snack bar run by locals.. The water is crystal clear and shallow for 100 metres deep.

This residential area and is 2 km from the town of Alcudia. Alcudia is an ancient walled Roman city with archeaological interest sites. The village surrounded by Roman walls, lots of restaurants, shops and street markets Nice evening dining in a small town plaza safe for children.

The house is located in a rural Mediterranean pine forests and fruit trees on a property with more than 70,000 square meters to enjoy complete peace and privacy.
There are two traditional buildings rehabilitated in 2012 by ourselves, who are the architects: the main house has a spacious living room with fireplace, a dining room, kitchen and a bathroom and there are two bedrooms on the ground floor. Next to the main house is a bedroom annex with an en suite bathroom. The set of the two houses is 150 square meters.
The whole is surrounded by spacious terraces with outdoor furniture to enjoy nature with all kind of comforts.

It is possible to walk and hike the whole length of the property. Even it is possible

Ideal for young people who want
neighborhood_overview:

Santa Catalina is like a little village, architecture is traditional but restored, one would not believe this is such a central location!

Since the flat is in the heart of Palma, it is not recommended for people who are sensitive to normal street noise.

Private parking is not included in the offer, however there is a big free parking zone right across the street.

Ideal place for families.

The space

All the second floor has been recently renovated.

neighborhood_overview:
Our house is located in Portocolom, by the sea and near the church in the old part of the village.
It is a typical fishing village, an idyllic place, unspoilt by mass tourism.
Portocolom is the only coastal town that retains the characteristic typical of Mallorca.
The nearest beach is less than 500 meters from our house.
There are possibilities for water sports and beautiful hiking trails.
An ideal place for families and children for its tranquility and proximity to the sea.

Nearby Portocolom there are beautiful and unspoilt beaches.

The village has good restaurants, supermarkets, shops and all amenities: Golf Course less than 3 km, Boat Rentals, Scuba diving, bike rental......

You can reach from Portocolom some of the best psicoblock areas (climbing, “deep-water soloing”) of Mallorca: Es Pontas, Cala Barques, Cala Llombards, Cala Ferrera, The lighthouse Area, Cala Marsal....

In 2000 Finca Can Duvai was converted very tasteful into a charming hotel.

The lovely, spacious garden with its majestic trees invites you to linger on one of the shady terraces beside the pool or take a seat near the driving range. The 14 apartments all are tastefully furnished, in Majorcan manner and offer all comfort. Most of them have its own terrace, facing the beautiful patio and garden. Over the winter 2011/12 they have been renovated and partially upgraded.
Beautiful apartment In Finca Can Duvai you will be able to enjoy a unique fusion of Majorca

On the other hand, there also find the best fish restaurants, ice cream parlors and clothing stores. And facing the beach, kilometers of fine sand that draws the Bay of Alcudia with its crystal clear turquoise waters. It is the most popular beach, with all services: bars, boat rental and sailing courses and a water park.

But this beach, the longest in Mallorca (10 km), is not alone. Nearby you will find nearly twenty: sand, pebble, rock, accessible only by sea songs. Among the intimate beaches stands Alcanada, or the S′Illot Coll Baix. The latter is a true marvel of nature that is only accessible by boat or after

neighborhood_overview:
Son Serrra de Marina is a small seaside resort in the Alcudia Bay and also a popular area for individualists who are seeking for the most authentic side of the Balearic islands. The beach is great for kite surfing, backs on to sand dunes and unspoiled countryside. Son Serra is situated between Can Picafort and Colonia San Pere. The Parc Natural de s’Albufera is a few miles away, like the Parc of the public estate of Son Real (unique natural landscape riddled with archaeological sites). Along the northern coast, walking, cycling or horse riding is perfect for nature lovers and typical mediterranean ports or mallorcan villages as Puerto Alcudia, Alcudia, Puerto Pollença, Pollença or Inca and of course also Palma de Mallorca, the capital are worth a visit.

Esta ubicada con vistas a la Bahia de Pollença y es una zona muy exclusiva y residencial, lejos de cualquier tipo de ruido e ideal para relajarse solo o en compañia.

License number
ETV 2666. (Conselleria de Turismo de las Islas Baleares)

Ano
neighborhood_overview:
This is the harbour of Felanitx. A quiet fishing place in Majorca´s southeast and one of the largest natural harbours of the island, refuge for countless boats looking for calm waters in the summer. An ideal place for those who like the charm of a fishing harbour.

Portocolom, where development has left its charm as a fishing port untouched, and which still reflects a delightful maritime air in its picturesque corners. Its lighthouse, built in 1860, 42 m. above sea level, enhances the beauty of this great Mediterranean port even more.

The seafaring spirit of the place, its traditional artisan work, its close attachment to the land, its local dances and its regional cuisine continue still as the signs of identity of a Mediterranean town as many faceted, imperishable and different as its daily life.Prehistoric relics, hidden coves, charming villages and above all its friendly people who retain the beauty of the Mallorcan spirit within them.

The Felanitx

description:

The space
Situated in a tranquil Mallorcan village in the foothills of the island mountain range, within easy reach of all that Mallorca has to offer the visitor. Campanet has approx 2500 residents. The area is popular with cyclists and walkers with well sign posted country and mountain routes. By car 15 minutes takes you to several beaches and resorts, 30 minutes and you reach Palma, the capital with its many shops and vibrant nightlife. The village offers a reliable bus service and local train stations in nearby towns.

neighborhood_overview:
The house is in the countryside a few minutes from Ciutadella (which can be seen from the terrace). There are a few other houses around, all far enough to respect the privacy of the garden. The area is also very quiet.

Ciutadella is the gem city of the island, its historic centre is renowned across Spain and the mediterranean. Bursting with restaurants, small shops and a great night-life down in the port, it still offers a relaxing quietness other places can no longer pretend to have.

Minorca offers some of the best beaches in the entire mediterranean. From Ciutadella, you are close to the south coast beaches famous for their clear turquoise water and fine white sands (Cala Turqueta, Cala Macarella, Son Saura) but also from some of the northern coast most preserved beaches like Algaiarens or Cala Pilar.

Another room with sofa bed and desk. One other comfortable bathroom with nice shower. And a large dining room overlooking the sea. Located next to the Plaza Menorca, the bus line crosses the island. If traveling by car, usually there is no problem to parking in the area (it is possible to opt for a private parking). Fantastic beaches a few kilometres.

Mahon is the island capital and it was an English port three centuries ago although some of the architecture remains. It gave name to the mayonnaise and it is known for its wonderful Mahonaisse cheese.

name: Terrific Couples Getaway in Minorca
description:
The space
The house was built in 19th century as a simple shelter for the forest ranger. It is built following the techniques of the vernacular architecture of Minorca: using "pedra i morter" which is a combination of calcareous stones and a mortar of lime and soil made locally.
In 2009 the house was completely rebuilt to adapt it to the actual way of living and to achieve the main aim of the house: Be a place to relax yourself and disconnect of the urban world.
Although it is isolated in the forest, the house is in the middle of the island of Minorca, which makes so easy the access to both, the north coast (10min by car) and the south coast (20min by car)

In winter, the forest is felt up with all classes of mushrooms and wild fruits, in autumn the brown of the leaves in the soil reflects the light make it very special, in spring there is the explosion of colours and smells and in summer the vegetation dries a lot but always assuring the presence of a g

Casa Rockmorell, situated in sheltered upper part of Cala Morell, is surrounded by a pine forest. The house is only 15 minutes walk from the beach and 5 minutes walk from the ´Cami de Cavalls`.

The house consists of three apartments with independent access. The property can be rented as one entire holiday home , or depending on the time of the season as individual apartments.

Apartment (max 6 per.) ground floor / downstairs
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood
Cala Morell is a quiet urbanization with some local population all year around and mostly tourist familys in summer.

name: Apartment in Ciutadella de Menorca
description:
The space
Very quiet apartment, located a few minutes from the port of Ciutadella, the beach and the city center, where econtrará multiple restaurants, bars, pubs, shops ... ATTENTION: We have minimum stay 1 week. The price can vary between 600 and 1050 € depending on season.

name: Nice House swimming pool&sea views
description:
The space
Two floor house. Ground floor: living-room, kitchen, bathroom, 1 double bedroom, private garden overlooking the sea and back yard. Upstairs: 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and 2 terraces, one with sea views. Garden and communal swimming pools. It has a children's pool. It also has an outdoor parking space for one car.
The views are perfect to watch the sunset and enjoy the pleasant summer evenings in Menorca. The house is fully equipped with all necessary appliances: hob, oven, dishwasher, microwave, coffee maker and washing machine. Located in the northern half of the island, about two minutes from Port d'Adaia or Cales Coves and about ten of Fornells, five in Son Parc and near Ses Salines. It belongs to the municipality of Mercadal. It is about 50m from the sea.
As refering to transport there is a bus line that crosses the island. If traveling by car, no problem of parking in the area (also counting with a parquing private space). A few kilometers fantastic

name: Wonderful antic Villa.Perfect for family vacation!
description:
Magic 300 year old villa with grate garden, small swiminpool and little tree house. Perfect for family vacations!

The space
It's a traditional Menorcan villa built in stone and wood beams, with and old will underneath. refurbished and tastefully decorated in a rustic style. Very homely and calm; Set in a quiet residential area yet in walking distance of shops, restaurants, and bars. Just perfect for a relaxing holiday!
Garden and terrace receive sunshine practically the whole day The garden has dining furniture and a BBQ and is perfect for al fresco dining! The terrace enjoys an ample view and is perfect for admiring the sunset.
This is a recently reformed house, suitable for both summer and winter lets. Four of the rooms have their own electric heating and the dinning area has a big fire place.
The lawn 1500m2 (about 0.4 acres) is also surrounded by plants, and wild olive trees. The garden integrates into the nature.
This beautiful house is
neighborhood_overview: 5 min walkig distance to center Sant lluis, very small town with some shops and restaurant.

name: House in the centre of Ciutadella
description:
The space
Beautiful house menorquin style in the centre of Ciutadella between the Cathedral and the harbour. House with
2 double bedrooms, 1 bathroom, big kitchen with dining-room, living-room and terrace with sofa. Very well decorated and well equiped (television, video, microwaves, washing machine, dry-machine, dishwasher, full equiped, bed clothes, towells etc).
Three floors. The house is very cosy and new.
From the 23th of June you can enjoy the "Jaleo" o "Sant Joan", the famouse horses party and you can see it from the house.
The house is in the best possible location if you want to stay in the centre of the city.
Traffic is not allowed in the street. The area is very familiar and menorquin people.
If you need someone to pick you up at the airport we can arrange it. We can rent you bicycles, because is the best way to move around.
Close to restaurants and shops and near transports.

name: Sa Blanca. Impresionantes vistas
description:
Villa en un rincón incomparable de Menorca a pocos metros de la playa.
Situada a 51 m. sobre el nivel del mar, Villa Binimel-la ofrece unas impresionantes vistas a la bahía de Binimel-la, Cala Pregonda y el campo menorquín es un entorno de tranquili

The space
Situada a 51 m. sobre el nivel del mar, en una parcela de 1290 m, Sa Blanca ofrece unas impresionantes vistas a la bahía de Binimel-la, Cala Pregonda y el campo. La casa, recién reformada, está equipada con todas las comodidades para que su estancia en la isla sea relajada y placentera. Su privilegiada situación y la ausencia de vecinos cercanos hace de este emplazamiento un lugar idílico para disfrutar de la tranquilidad de la isla.

El exterior se compone de un jardín poblado por plantas autóctonas, zona de relajación y 115 m2 de terraza distribuidos en 3 niveles; la azotea (solarium) ideal para observar las estrellas, vistas de 360º tanto al campo como al mar, y otras 2 terrazas donde poder
neighborhood_overview: es un sitio muy tranquilo. no hay vecinos

description:

Ground floor apartment in the complex care of the urbanization Costa Arenal Arenal d'en Castell - Menorca. It has two swimming pools (adults and children) and garden. The beach is about 150 meters. Located in residential area with several supermarkets, pharmacy, restaurants, etc.. Private well connected with bus line (stop 50 meters) is located at a distance of 5 kms from the fishing port of Fornells and about 20 kms from Ciutadella and Mahon. Gay Friendly.

name: Habitación en Casa de campo en Menorca
description:
Casita cerca del mar, en una zona de campo muy tranquila, con un bonito jardín y una magnifica sombra en un pequeño bosque. Con comedor y barbacoa exterior.
Paseo encantador de 10 minutos andando para llegar al mar y poder nadar.

The space
Casa con encanto (casita de 35 m2) con un jardín agradable y un bosque sombreado, con salida directa al Cami de Cavalls.
Esta ubicada entre Sant Lluís y Es Castell situada en la punta Este de la isla.
Con vistas al mar (10 min andando), en la entrada del Puerto de Mahón.
Zona muy tranquila.
La casa esta completamente amueblada, cama doble en estancia principal con cocina y baño con ducha, y otro espacio recibidor comedor interior acristalado con sofá cama. Barbacoa exterior con comedor.
Compartimos el terreno donde estamos instalados también.
En coche a 10 minutos de Sant Lluis y Es Castell, y a 15 minutos de Mahon

Guest access
La casa esta situada en un lugar muy tranq
neighborhood_overview: Es un sito muy tranquilo, mayoritariamente estas rodeado de huertos. Aunque tenemos un buen vecino cerca, hay muy buena relacion.

name: Villa Retama. Magnificent house
description:
The space
Magnificent house for a holiday amazing surroundings

Coves Noves is a quiet complex in the municipal area of Es Mercadal, in the north of Menorca. It's located in a hillside, most of its properties has marvellous views to the sea and to the coast. At 800m you can find Arenal de'n Castell, a famous beach with white sand, and all the facilities of a friendly beach. Near our complex there are: at 2km Port d'Addaia, an sport harbour, essential per sea and navigation lovers, and at 7km the Campo de Golf Son Parc. Our complex has the Tennis Club Coves Noves, a private sportive club in exclusive use for its memberships, guests and accredited people. There is a very large swimming-pool with communal gardens, tennis and paddle courts, and an snack bar with large terraces.

Characteristics
Large , comfortable and bright semidetached house with private garden and swimming-pool.

In the first floor with lovely sea views there is 1 double be
neighborhood_overview:
Here you are a few recommendations that some of them you would not fine on guides...
Since Villa Retama is close to Adaia, I know better north of the island. Driving distances are short.
• Restaurant In Caragol (629165098, 629165089): Is a terrace where you eat very good fish, with nice view to the sea (though the road goes under.) Road de Punta Prima-Binibequer.
• Restaurant Cap Roig (971,188,383). One of my favorite, lobster and chips... Booking essential. It is a little restaurant / tavern hangs on a cliff with beautiful views. Sa Mesquida road, north of Mahon.
• Restaurant Can Bernat: In the Road Mahon to Fornells. Quite closet to our house.
• Es Grau, which is a very nice little town. Also there is the National Park Albufera des Grau, give them a ride because it is very nice
• In Mahon, the port, beautiful. There are many restaurants but I like a lot one little restaurant to eat fish: S'Espigo (971,369,909).
• Restaurante Sa Mesquida: En Sa Me

name: Bajo con piscina y jardin privado
description:
The space
Acogedor apartamento de dos habitaciones ( 4 personas máx.) situado en una zona tranquila, cerca del Lago de Calan Bosch y del centro comercial, a 7 km de Ciutadella de Menorca, a 200mt parada autobús hacia Ciutadella, a 300 metros de la playa (7 mín. andando). En los alrededores podrá encontrar todo tipo de servicios (de junio a septiembre abiertos los 7 días de la semana), restaurantes, alquiler de barcos (con o sin patron), todo tipo de actividades para niños y adultos, parques acuaticos.

El apartamento dispone de jardín privado (80 m2) da a las habitaciones, terraza privada que da al salón, y piscina comunitaria con dos niveles (una para los más pequeños)

Cocina totalmente equipada (obra nueva 2016), con microondas y vitroceramica, nevera grande y lavadora. Para los bebes de la casa, tienen cuna de viaje y trona, en el precio se incluye también sábanas y toallas de baño, limpieza de entrada y salida.

En el apartado de "fotos"
neighborhood_overview:
Es un barrio tranquilo y familiar.
Debido a su óptima ubicación, las tiendas, restaurantes, bares y cafés, farmacias, alquiler bicicletas, coches, motos, ocio familiar... (todo tipo de servicios) están a 250 metros (3 minutos a pie) y la playa más cercana, Cala'n Bosch, a 550 metros (6 minutos a pie).

name: Casa con terraza, piscina y paddel
description:
The space
Apartamento nuevo a estrenar que dispone de 3 habitaciones completas y 1 baño para capacidad máxima de 5 personas. Ideal para parejas o matrimonios con hijos. El apartamento dispone de terraza con mesa y sillas. El apartamento se sitúa en un complejo de lujo con piscina y pista de paddel.
El apartamento está tan solo a 5 minutos de una preciosa cala y a tan solo 1,5 KM del nucleo urbano Ciudadela que puedes ir andando o con bicicleta.
El apartamento está completamente equipado y decorado con un estilo acogedor y moderno para hacerte tu estancia como si estuvieras en tu propia casa.
Ideal para descansar y relajarse. El barrio es residencial, muy tranquilo. Podrás ir andando a una cala y por supuesto todas las playas de Menorca muy cerca.
Estamos para ayudarte
Gracias!

name: Apartment in Cala en Forcat,Menorca
description:
The space
Beautiful apartment in Menorca, walk to the Cala en Forcat (Ciutadella) for up to 7 people.
Menorca is the most beautiful island of the Balearic archipelago and is an ideal visit for people of all ages, although it is the ideal destination for families who want to relax combining cultural visits coves that have little to envy the Caribe.Si're a couple , Menorca also surprise you, so romantic few places where we lose in Spain.

As a mater of interest, Menorca in 1993 UNESCO declared Biosphere Reserve because of its environmental diversity and natural values​​.

En cumplimiento de la normativa autonómica, todos los huéspedes deberán pagar la tasa turística de 2€/persona/día.

El piso tiene 3 habitaciones; la que alquilo, otra donde duermo yo y una más en la que doy masajes. También tengo un perro tranquilo, no da problemas.

Peace of mind.

Un lujo en el mismo centro.

The space
En el centro de Maó, primer piso en casa antigua rehabilitada con mucho carácter y PERSONALIDAD. Zona muy TRANQUILA a pie a 3 min. del puerto y 10 min. en coche del aeropuerto.
Zona de PARKING gratuito a 4 min.
El mercado ubicado en un antiguo claustro se encuentra a 2 minutos, también acoge un supermercado y parking en su planta baja. A su salida encontramos el mercado de pescado. Diversos accesos nos llevan al puerto, allí descubrirás diferentes tipos de
neighborhood_overview:
El MERCADO ubicado en un antiguo claustro a 2 minutos posee un SUPERMERCADO y PARKING en su planta baja.
A 4 minutos está el MERCADO DE PESCADO, “Sa Peixatería", ubicado en un interesante edificio de principios del siglo pasado, donde a parte de vender pescado también podràs tomar algo en su patio disfrutando a su vez de alguna actuación de MÚSICA en VIVO.
Allí mismo, el centro de la ciudad, destacando el Centro de Arte e Historia Ca n’Oliver, el Teatro Principal (el teatro de ópera nás antiguo de España), el Ayuntamiento, la Iglesia de Santa María con su monumental órgano, el Pont de Sant Roc, antigua puerta de la muralla mediaval del siglo XIV, Calle Isabel II, una de las mas bonitas de la ciudad, y el Museo de Menorca.
Diversos accesos nos llevan al PUERTO, también ideal para hacer footing o simplemente pasear, donde se encuentran diferentes tipos de bares y restaurantes así como lugares de ocio nocturno.

description:
Antiguo establo de 60 m² restaurado con encanto en zona rural de San Luis, Menorca. Espacio abierto tipo loft con cocina y baño independientes, además de 102 m² de terraza y 400 m² de jardín privado.

The space
Está situado a 10 minutos andando del pueblo de San Luis, a 4 km de la costa sur-este con playas y calas de aguas cristalinas. Mahón, capital de la isla se encuentra también a 4 km y el aeropuerto de Menorca a tan sólo 6 km.

El alojamiento ha sido recientemente restaurado y adaptado como vivienda. Se encuentra en un terreno de aproximadamente 2000 m², anexo a la casa principal, pero totalmente independiente de la misma.

Es una construcción típica menorquina de piedra seca y tejas de barro, con dos grandes ventanas orientadas al sur, además de dos grandes puertas de salida a la terraza. name: PRIVATE POOL. FREE WIFI. SMART TV.VILLA FRANCISCA
description:
Espectacular villa con capacidad para 8 personas. Amplias habitaciones, jardín y piscina privada. En zona residencial. A 5 minutos del centro de Ciutadella. Cerca de bonitas calas.
La casa dispone de todo lo que necesita para su estancia vacacional en Ciutadella. Sin duda, lo mejor de la villa es que se encuentra en una urbanización muy tranquila y a su vez proxima a Ciutadella.
A la llegada a la villa, se deberá abonar la tasa turística de 2 euros por persona/dia en temporada alta ( +16años).

The space
Ubicado en un a zona residencial, Villa Francisca es una casa muy tranquila, amplia y luminosa. Rodeada de jardines y de una piscina, la casa posee todas las comodidades que ud. pueda esperar.

Guest access
La casa está ubicada en una parcela de 1000 m2 privados en un entorno muy tranquilo y a solo 5 minutos en coche de Ciutadella. Dispone de zona de piscina privada y de huerto casero.

Other things to note
neighborhood_overview: Es una urbanización residencial, sa Caleta, muy tranquila y a su vez cercana a Ciutadella. Dispone de un supermercado muy cerca de la casa y la playa de Sa Caleta a tan solo 10 minutos a pie de la casa.

name: 5 Bed Villa by Beaches, Menorca
description:
Situated in a wildlife conservation area this rustic Villa boasts a privileged & beautiful location offering sunset & sea views from the veranda. Be first & last on the intimate beaches only moments away. Dine al fresco for breakfast, lunch & dinner.

The space
The villa has 2 twin bedrooms and a single bedroom and comfortably fits 5 people.
The Villa is clean inside, rustic in style and with basic amenities.
There is a small kitchen, good size living room, veranda and roof terrace.
There are 2 toilets but only one bathroom has decent enough water pressure for showering.
There are secure shutters on all windows and doors plus mosquito netting (which has recently been upgraded in 2016) on all bedroom windows.
Bed linen and towels are provided.
Also recently added are some traditional natural wood Menorcan style rail guards along the arches of the veranda balcony in order to improve safety for small children.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
This villa is set in a remote and peaceful conservation area away from built up urban areas and surrounded by wildlife and 4 minutes walk from a variety of lovely beaches.
(Please Note: during JULY & AUGUST a lot more tourists visit Menorca and as a result a lot more people during the day visit the beaches around the villa at Binimela and Pregonda across the bay from the villa.)

The nearest town is Mercadal and can be reached in 25 minutes by car. There is a well stocked supermarket along with a few cafes, bars and other clothes, food shops. You can do all your food and provision shopping in Mercadal, post letters, buy cigarettes and alcohol or even go out for a meal.

name: Na Joanassa, the Endemic House
description:
Special house in a special place,
license n° ET 1843 ME

The space
The house is located in front of the sea. It has the most wonderful views.
It has one master bedroom with a double bed, one bedroom with two singles, one bathroom and a third bedroom, with access from steps outside the house, with 3 single beds and a bathroom.
In total 3 bedrooms and two bathrooms.
The kitchen is open, it has a dinning and a living room . Also outside a nice covered space with a barbecue.
The house is sitting on top of a rocky platform. The place is quiet and there is no neighboors close to it. You will be less than 5 ninutes away of supermarkets, restaurants, other entertainments, and one of the most beautiful beaches of Menorca, Arenal D'en Castell.
This is a secluded house for adventurers and nature lovers looking for a peacefull and special place. Is comfortable but is not a luxury villa.
It is well equiped, car stays a necessity.

name: Apartamento vistas al mar Les Pérgoles Son Parc
description:
Apartamento dúplex con vistas al mar situado en la urb. Les Pérgoles de Son Parc, tiene 2 habitaciones dobles, 1 baño, 1 aseo, cocina, comedor, terraza, trastero, suelos de parket, jardín, parque infantil, parking particular y 2 piscinas comunitarias.

La playa de Arenal de son Saura está a 6 minutos andando.

The space
Precioso duplex con vistas al mar, con dos piscinas comunitarias, una para niños, en un entorno absolutamente tranquilo.

Guest access
Pueden acceder a la zona de piscinas así como a la zona ajardinada infantil.

Other things to note
Justo en la puerta de acceso al apartamento hay una caja de seguridad donde encontraran las llaves. También pueden usarlo para dejar las llaves ahí cuando salgan del apartamento. El código para abrir la caja se lo proporcionaré en el momento del check in.

License number

name: Nice Villa @ Ciutadella of Menorca
description:
Outstanding villa with magnificient views of Ciudadela's bay and harbour, located on a quiet and natural location. Just 10 minutes walking from village center. Ideal for families.

The space
Nice comfortable and clean house with a big garden in front of the sea (Its possible to swim), just at 10 minutes walk from city center and 5 minutes from the closest beach.
It has 4 bedrooms,2 wc,1 living room and 1 kitchen. On the exterior 3 chillouts.


The villa its located (carrer sa punta des bancal 8) on a premium location, just in front of the sea, with magic views over Ciudadella harbour and its bay.
It is a quiet neighborhood, where you can relax yourself and enjoy your time on this little piece of paradise.
The villa was constructed on 1930, so it conserves the traditional menorca architeture, combined with modern but hippy, lounge/garden area, sorrounded by typical vegetation of the island.
You have lovely walks through Sa Farola

.

Traditional market of fruits and vegetables, with organic produce.

Supermarkets Mercadona, Lidl, Dia, Eroski found in the industrial estate.

Casino "17 Gener" located on Constitution Avenue open 24 Hrs.

Racetrack "Torre del Ram" with harness racing (thoroughbred horses pulling a cart with a rider, English m

name: Simple and renovated Menorcan house
description:
We are a young family half from Menorca half from Helsinki. We have just been renovating our countryside summer house 10 min. driving from Ciutadella. The house has a simple style with all the commodities we might need for a quiet and pleasant stay.

The space
There is a big room with 5 meter ceiling and this space has fully equipped kitchen, living room and the dining area.

There is three bedrooms; one master bedroom with double bed (180x200) with nice big glass doors, one bedroom with single bed (90x180) and another bedroom with two single beds which can be united as well.

There is the front terrace which in the afternoon/evening has a nice refreshing shadow. But we spend most of our time in the other side of the house under a big old tree.

Other things to note
Behind the house there is a garden, where we grow a lot of vegetables. My father takes care of that. If you are nice he might offer vegetables or fruits strai
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is an area with houses similar to ours.

name: Menorcan Villa with exclusive Pool
description:
Sonblanc is a traditional farmhouse that has the beauty of its original features.

What our guests like the most: "The house was amazing, your communication was second to none and the pool was definitely my favourite place"; "The house is magnificent, very well decorated with a lot of character. ....The swimming pool area is very pleasant and the whole property is very well maintained"; "SonBlanc is a very beautiful house, with a wonderful swimming pool, located in a peaceful area"

The space
This charming and spacious country Villa offers full privacy and security for a wonderful stay in Menorca. It is a principal house (PH) with two apartments/houses within it plus a guest-house (GH). The villa is very close to the airport (but no noise is heard), Mahón and biking distance to Sant LLuis.

The property offers everything you can look for to enjoy a sun and beach holiday but also all the peace, quietness and independence of a country house wi
neighborhood_overview:
The villa is located in the country in Sant Lluis. Sant Lluis is in southern Menorca, just a few kilometers from the capital, Mahon. It is most noteworthy for its varied coastline, with fine sand beaches and cliffs. You will find the beautiful coves of Binsissafuller, Biniaconlla and Binibeca, with their typical whitewashed fishermen's houses.
There is a big supermarket very close from our home (5 to 10 minutes by car), Eroski, that opens from monday to sunday (included) from 9 am in the morning to 21.30 at night

name: Apartamento vistas al mar
description:
Campo de golf y tenis a la entrada de la urbanización. Bien comunicado y en zona muy tranquila, a 12 Kms. del puerto de Fornells y aprox. a 20 minutos, de Mahón. 1 dormitorio doble y otro para 2. chimenea, barbacoa, 3 terrazas. piscina comunitaria y playa a 50 metros.

The space
Su gran espacio, intimidad con los vecinos, situación al lado de la playa, tranquilidad y mucho más que tú mismo descubriras

Guest access
Jardín con césped y piscina a 50 mt. de la playa.

Other things to note
La situación que ofrece el google no es del todo correcta, es la misma calle, pero donde se ubica el apartamento hay unas vistas preciosas, que no tiene la ubicación actual de google.
Qué vengan con ganas de disfrutar de la naturaleza y de Menorca!

License number
GE/004349/2019
neighborhood_overview:
Es una zona muy tranquila y la vez está a unos minutos del centro comercial.

No pasan muchos coches lo que propicia un buen descanso, tanto de noche como de día.

name: Habitación en piso céntrico y luminoso
description: Disfruta de la sencillez de este alojamiento tranquilo, céntrico y luminoso, cercano a todos los servicios (estación de bus, farmacia, supermercados, restaurantes, panadería, etc.). Tarifas especiales para estancias de más de dos semanas.

name: Apart.  con aire acondicionado al lado de la playa
description:
Grupo de 16 apartamentos de 1 dormitorio y MAXIMA CAPACIDAD 2 ADULTOS + 2 NIÑOS con aire acondicionado distribuidos en 2 plantas ubicados dentro del complejo LAS BRISAS lo que busca es un lugar tranquilo y natural en LAS BRISAS lo encontrará.
Estratégicamente situados entre 2 buenas playas: SON XORIGUER y CALAN BOSCH, ambas de arena fina y aguas cristalinas. A ambas se llega caminando en 5-10 minutos, lo cual es realmente práctico y proporciona mucha libertad y descanso, pues nada es complicado.

The space
17 apartamentos, ubicados casi todos en un mismo bloque (Bloque D), distribuidos en 2 plantas y rodeado de césped y jardineras.
Salón comedor con sofá-nido, Televisión plana y ventilador de techo. Aquí está la única máquina de Aire Acondicionado (frío/calor) de la casa, colocada frente a la puerta del dormitorio.
Pequeña cocina, pero está bien equipada con microondas, cafetera Italiana, batidora, hervidor eléctrico, tostador, pequeña nevera de las
neighborhood_overview:
El complejo LAS BRISAS, está situado estratégicamente entre 2 buenas playas: SON XORIGUER y CALAN BOSCH, ambas de arena fina y aguas cristalinas que disponen de todos los servicios. A ambas se llega caminando en 5-10 minutos, lo cual es realmente práctico y proporciona mucha libertad y descanso, pues nada es complicado.
Desde LAS BRISAS, en un radio de 500m encontrará todo lo que pueda necesitar.
Desde la playa de Son Xoriguer podrán continuar el “CAMI DE CAVALLS”, antigua camino costero que ha sido recuperado, para nuestro disfrute.
En el puerto deportivo de Calan Bosch, conocido como “EL LAGO” encontrará todo lo que pueda necesitar; así como en la Playa de Son Xoriguer. También hay un parque acuático muy cercano. Recomiendo un bonito paseo que bordea la costa, al faro D'Artrutx, desde donde disfrutar del atardecer.

name: Chalet per 6 persone Cala Santandria Menorca
description:
Tranquillissima villa dotata di 3 camere da letto con aria condizionata, 2 bagni + 1 di servizio, cucina, ampio soggiorno, giardino e terrazza con barbecue.
Situata a 10 minuti dalla spiaggia di Cala Santandria in un quartiere tranquillo e silenzioso.
Nella zona si trova un supermercato, ristoranti e bar.

Other things to note
Fermata dell'autobus a 300 mt.
Si accettano animali domestici di piccola taglia.
Culla e seggiolone per bambini su richiesta
Pulizia iniziale e finale incluse nel prezzo.
Lenzuola e asciugamani forniti e inclusi nel prezzo.

name: Casa Rockmorell / 4pers apart. pine view terrace
description:
Casa Rockmorell, situated in the resort of Cala Morell, is a beautiful house overlooking a pine forest. Cala Morell is known for its impressive cliffs, wonderful sunsets and some of the oldest prehistoric settlements on the island. White houses and reflecting light, characterize the bay and surroundings. The sheltered cove is a fantastic site for diving and snorkeling. Hikers find themselves only two steps away from the´Cami de Cavalls`
July / August minimum stay one week
VT818ME

The space
Accommodation
Casa Rockmorell, situated in sheltered upper part of Cala Morell, is surrounded by a pine forest. The house is only 15 minutes walk from the beach and 5 minutes walk from the ´Cami de Cavalls`.

The house consists of three apartments with independent access. The property can be rented as one entire holiday home , or depending on the time of the season as individual apartments.

Apartment (max. 4 pers.) upstairs: providing two do
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood
Cala Morell is a quiet urbanization with some local population all year around and mostly tourist familys in summer.

name: Menorca Breathtaking views
description:
On the south coast of Menorca, magnificent house in luxury development front line with stunning views of the Mediterranean Sea . House careful to detail , beautifully decorated in white and blue tones

The space
The house has two floors . Upstairs are two double bedrooms each with its own bathroom and a lovely terrace with a Balinese bed , where wonderful views can be enjoyed .
On the ground floor there is a living room with kitchenette and a reading area and TV . From the living you have access directly to the porch with beautiful ocean views. There is another more casual bedroom with two double bunk beds and a third bathroom with shower. The house is accessed through a small courtyard with flowers and plants.
The whole house is decorated in marine style , in white and blue , which gives a very bright. It is the house we enjoyed personally with my family during the summer months , but during the rest of the year , offers many possibilities to guarantee

The pool is one of the fewe heated pools on the island. Extra cost may occur for heating the pool.

All private individual use. Access to everything.

Other things to note
We also run a boat rental company in Mahon. Villa guest have a 15% discount.
