name: Alojamiento con encanto
description:
¿Tenéis intención de visitar Menorca? ¡aquí tenéis una casa con encanto!

The space
Situada en la Costa Sur de la isla de Menorca junto al conocido Pueblo de Pescadores y a unos 300 m de la Playa de Binibeca.

Cuenta con amplias terrazas con impresionantes vistas al mar, jardín con piscina privada y barbacoa. Acceso a diversas calas naturales para tomar el sol y bañarse a 50 m de la casa.

En la urbanización encontraréis dos supermercados, una heladería, tiendas de artesanía, cafeterías, bares y restaurantes.

Guest access
Distribuída en dos plantas y totalmente amueblada, la vivienda consta de 3 dormitorios, dos dobles, uno de ellos con cama de matrimonio, TV y aire acondicionado, otro con 2 camas y aire acondicionado y uno individual.

Cuenta también con dos cuartos de baño, cocina totalmente equipada (lavavajillas, microondas, etc ), salón-comedor con TV, Canal Satélite y ventilador de techo, y lavadero.

name: Charming Fisherman´s house
description:
Best sun, sea and food in the charming village of Fornells.1 minute from the sea. Perfect to live a real mediterranean experience and discover Menorca Unesco reserve of the biosphere. Old fisherman white house surrounded by unspoiled beaches.Great!

The space
This a an old fisherman´s house very untouched but with new amenities.
It feels free and save kids can go around town on their own and go fishing in the harbour or go to buy a little something from the supermarket.
the guests would enjoy the little charm of a village and the sea whichis one minute away.
there are four rooms and one bunkbed on the openend space. it is beautifully basic and raw.

Guest access
the guest would have access tot he entire home exlcuding any locked cupboard.
the patio is a perfect outdoor space to have breakfast and dinner maybe to hot for lunch but has an extra reception dining space.
the house is big althoug narrow and long. fressh to
neighborhood_overview: it is a charming fiherman´s village where everybody is charming and nice. Delicious restaurants as well as a harbour where you can rent a day boat or kyaks or bicycles. great icecream an even some traditional markets. despite being one of the most popular places in the island for its beauty it is not crowded and still has the traditional atmosphere.

name: Cosy 3 bedroom apartment in Menorca
description:
Our apartment has 2 double bedrooms, 1 with en-suite facilities, and a third bedroom with bunk beds. It benefits from a large balcony area, complete with BBQ and table and chairs overlooking the golf course and only 2 minutes drive to the beach.

The space
Fantastic views of the golf course, quiet and cosy apartment only minutes from one of the nicest beaches in Menorca.

Guest have access to private parking behind the apartment and a communal swimming pool.

The apartment will be ready for the guests arrival. Key is in a locked key box, the combination will be provided to the guests prior to arrival.

Overlooking the golf course and only a few minutes away from a lovely beach and other amenities such as restaurants, supermarkets, shops or pubs.

The prices are per week and depend on the month of rent.

Guest access
Guest have access to private parking behind the apartment and a communal swimming pool.
neighborhood_overview: Overlooking the golf course and only a few minutes away from a lovely beach and other amenities such as restaurants, supermarkets, shops or pubs.

name: Excepcional finca rústica, acogedora y espaciosa
description:
Rustic and quiet farm in very picturesque and secluded area. Located in the center of this small Mediterranean island, it is ideal to visit all its wonderful beaches with crystal clear waters. Less than half an hour away from the main towns. You will sleep lulled by the tranquility that the rural environment offers and under a spectacular starry sky, lost long ago in the big cities.

The space
Located on the top floor of the main house, the loft or private apartment has a spacious bedroom with a central fireplace, kitchen and bathroom, as well as a large private terrace with breakfast table, parasol and sun loungers. It has its own independent entrance.

Guest access
Swimming pool with magnificent views of the surrounding hills. Possibility to visit a nearby megalithic monument. Loose Menorquin horses, donkeys and other farm animals are part of the attractions of this picturesque country estate on the island of Menorca.

Other th
neighborhood_overview: Set of family houses, belonging to several brothers (the fourth generation already) that were built within a traditional country estate. Its central location on the island allows to be very close to all the beaches of the coast and at the same time very far from mass tourism. It is guaranteed that only the sounds of nature will accompany the rest. Five minutes drive from two villages with all kinds of services, apart from restaurants and shops. One of them, Ferrerías, is located the "Factory Shop" of the renowned brand of shoes and fashion accessories such as Mascaró, along with its other brands Pretty Ballarinas, Ursula Mascaró and Pretty Loafers.

La casa está rodeada de jardín y tiene mucho terreno lo que da una sensación de estar totalmente aislado.

Está ubicado entre Cala Blanca y Son Xoriguer y puedes acceder a la costa en 5 minutos y caminar por el trail de camí de cavalls (GR 223).


Conocemos la isla palmo a palmo porque nos encanta la naturaleza, si necesitáis cualquier información, no dudéis en preguntarnos.

Los vecinos son gente del pueblo, muy tranquila que hacen su vida al margen de todo.

Recomiendo que alquiléis un coche, ya que para conocer Menorca lo
neighborhood_overview: Los vecinos son gente del pueblo, muy tranquila que hacen su vida al margen de todo.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in the center of Seville, 50 meters from the Museum of Fine Arts and the Gualdalquivir River. It's also close to the Cathedral, Giralda, and Alcazar Palace. It's an ideal area for walking, enjoying a drink, and hunting for tapas.

name: BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT IN SEVILLE
description:
Nice apartment on the second floor of a beautiful house in the famous Alameda square in the old center of Seville. one bedroom with double bed, living room with kitchenette and a sofa bed for 1 adult or 2 children. A shared roof terrace.

The space
The apartment has one bedroom with a double bed, a living room with a sofa bed for one adult or 2 children. The kitchenette is fully equipped with washing machine, microwave and coffee maker. There is a digital TV, radio and a computer with Internet access (WiFi). You can visit the roof terrace which has a nice view of the square.

Guest access

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a prime, picturesque area of Old Seville, just a few minutes' walk from the Museo de Bellas Artes (Museum of Fine Arts), one of the oldest neighborhoods in the city. Surrounded by historic houses, squares and churches, as well as local greengrocers and bakeries, this section of Seville offers a true and authentic experience of life in this (in the words of The Rough Guide) 'irresistible city' - not just a turn through its highly-processed tourist areas.



Yet the apartment is also an easy walk to all of Sevilla's major sights and attractions - the Cathedral, the Giralda, the Barrio Santa Cruz, the Plaza de Espana, and more. Likewise, it is less than 5 minutes from the city's main shopping areas: La Campana, Tetouan and Sierpes street, El Corte Inglés ...



From the apartment you can easily reach the Guadalquivir River, the Isla Mágica theme park, the Triana neighborhood and the bus station Plaza de Armas.

neighborhood_overview:
Located in the city centre and, at the same time, on the banks of Guadalquivir River, El Arenal quarter is one of the quarters of Seville with more Andalusian tradition. Since it can be found in the old part of the city, it has witnessed first-hand many events in Seville history, because of having had one of the most important ports in the world during the 16th and 17th centuries, thanks to the discovery of America and the resulting trade with India.

El Arenal is, without a doubt, one of the most traditional and characteristic quarters in Seville. Furthermore, it is nowadays a busy and meeting place for people from Seville, since it is the quarter par excellence devoted to bullfighting, religious devotion, religious brotherhoods and Semana Santa (Holy Week) and these constitute the most significant features of this place.

This zone is home to such symbolic buildings as the La Maestranza bullring, the Torre del Oro tower, the Arenal market, the Torre de la Plata

neighborhood_overview:
El barrio es uno de lo mas antiguos de la ciudad, la calle Feria era una vía Romana, junto con la Calle San Luis que iban desde las puertas de la ciudad hasta la catedral, es facil que en paseo encuentres varias iglesias antiguas, preciosas. El mercado de abastos de la calle Feria es el mas antiguo de la ciudad. la zona conocida como "Las Setas", se encuentra andado a 5 minutos al igual que el Corte Ingles de la plaza del Duque.
En la Alameda tienes todos los bares de todos los estilos disponibles y numerosas terrazas donde tomar una copa y disfrutar de la gente.
En la alameda hay dos parques infantiles.
Existe cerca una escuelita libre donde puedes dejar a los niños y se lo pasarán muy bien jugando y compartiendo con otros, por un precio muy barato por la mañana de 9 a 14 h. y por la tarde de 17 a 20 h. se llama AMALUR y es de total confianza.

neighborhood_overview:
El Arenal es sin duda, uno de los barrios más tradicionales y emblemáticos de Sevilla. Fue durante el XVI y XVII una de las zonas portuarias más importantes del mundo, resultado del descubrimiento de América y el consiguiente comercio con Indias. Hoy día sigue siendo un lugar de gran actividad y punto de reunión de los sevillanos, sobre todo en torno al mundo del toreo, el teatro, la ópera y las cofradías.

Paseando por este barrio, tendremos oportunidad de conocer gran parte de la historia de la ciudad, con edificios como el Hospital de la Santa Caridad o las Capilla de la Hermandad de la Carretería y del Baratillo, con el ambiente "torero" que en él se advierte. Hubo un día en que como su nombre indica, este barrio fue un gran espacio abierto comprendido entre la puerta de Triana y la Torre del Oro. neighborhood_overview:
Certainly Seville is one of the most beautiful cities in Andalusia. With a thousand corners to travel day and night. A monumental atmosphere, with great samples of the valuable historical heritage that counts and a character that makes it close to the visitor.
I think that, despite the huge influx of foreign tourists, we can still breathe something of the traditional Seville if we look beyond the souvenir stands and the menus "for export". Both in the Barrio de Santa Cruz and in Triana you can get into the skin of the traditionally Andalusian city.
And as Seville is very typical of one side and the other of the Guadalquivir, you can not stop walking the streets of Triana. Among them:
The Triana Bridge
La Capillita del Carmen
Plaza del Altozano
The Castle of St George

neighborhood_overview:
El Arenal is undoubtedly one of the most traditional and emblematic neighborhoods of Seville. It was during the 16th and 17th centuries one of the most important port areas in the world, the result of the discovery of America and the consequent trade with the Indies. Today it is still a place of great activity and meeting point for Sevillians, especially around the world of bullfighting, theater, opera and brotherhoods.

Strolling through this neighborhood, we will have the opportunity to get to know a large part of the history of the city, with buildings such as the Hospital de la Santa Caridad or the Chapel of the Brotherhood of Carretería and Baratillo, with the "bullfighter" atmosphere that is warns. There was a day when, as its name indicates, this neighborhood was a large open space between the Triana gate and the Torre del Oro. neighborhood_overview:
Triana is a classic Sevillian neighborhood located on the other side of the Guadalquivir river. It extends from the Cartuja to the north to the neighborhood of Los Remedios to the south.

With a seafaring character and a great Sevillian tradition, it is the birthplace of bullfighters and artists and attracts many visitors seduced by its many tapas bars, its views of the river, its typical food market and its small Sevillian tile shops.

What to see in the neighborhood of Triana

Triana is not a particularly monumental neighborhood or full of tourist attractions. The main charm is its typically Sevillian atmosphere and we can highlight these points of interest:

Plaza del Altozano

It is the most emblematic place of the neighborhood and entrance from the bridge of Triana. In it we can see the Chapel of Carmen, the work of Anibal Gonzalez and the sculpture of the great bullfighter Juan Belmonte. From this square the main streets of the ne

The building is a restored old house. The building has an elevator.
The space is distributed in a spacious living room with a sofa bed. In addition to a table in the main area. It has two balconies th
neighborhood_overview:
Seville is the capital of Andalusia and one of the most populated cities in the Spanish territory. It still retains the characteristics of its ancient Arab settlers in its buildings and monuments, and boasts the largest old town in Spain. It is one of the largest historical centers in Europe, with wonderful monuments.

Around our apartment you can enjoy the Cathedral, the Giralda, the Torre del Oro, the Alcázar... no more than 5-10 minutes walk.

You can walk to several places of cultural interest: (5 min walk)

- Cathedral
- Real Alcazar Gardens.
- Giralda Tower
- Salvador Square
- Alfalfa Square.
- Market of the Encarnación (Setas Square)
- Setas de Sevilla.
- City hall.
-New Square.

8-10 min walk:

- Bullring
- Tower of Gold
- Jerez Gate.
- Duke Square.

Don't miss the unique atmosphere of the Art Market on the museum square on Sunday morning!

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Alfalfa, the new Soho in Seville called Soho Benita. Is a neighborhood very calm and safe where you can find a lot of gastrobar, bares, supermarkets, fresh products market, churchs, etc. The Catedral, Giralda and Alcazar is very closed, only 8 minutes walking. Plaza de la Encarnacion (Setas) is only 200 meters and Campana, Duque and Calle Sierpes is only at 400 meters.
In the area you have got ancient bares like El Rinconcillo the older bar in Seville. Also Taberna Los Coloniales is really very close.
The neighborhood is perfect to walk, have a coffee, eat tapas or have a lunch or dinner in gastrobar La Pincelada, Los Palillos, La Traviesa, La Pepona, El Perro viejo and more.

It is a safe area and always find people on the streets and on the terraces ..

The space

The bedroom has a double bed (1.50 x 2.00m), bu
neighborhood_overview: Macarena is a district full of local activity and colour, located in the northern part of the historic centre of Seville. Partially enclosed by a section of Seville’s ancient city wall, Macarena overflows with character stemming from its working-class history.  There is the wonderful fresh food market on Feria Street, as well as several bakeries, grocery stores, tapas bars and restaurants all nearby. The vibrant Alameda de Hércules is a recently renovated tree-lined square, popular with families during the day and with those who enjoy night-life after dark. The Alameda has many cafés, modern terrace bars and clubs which stay open late into the night. Heading north you'll find the Macarena gate, within a long stretch of the original city defensive walls, and the Basilica of the Macarena, home of one of Seville's most venerated religious images of the Virgin Mary.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the famous neighborhood of Cabanyal. A neighborhood that is fashionable, a symbol of citizen resistance and which attracts tourists and investors because of its proximity to the sea, its new environment and its prices.
The Cabanyal is reinvented to give itself a new opportunity and become the most authentic jewel of Valencia over the years.

Today, the seafaring side of the city offers a revitalization opportunity with the arrival of new neighbors who intend to make El Cabanyal what is Nothing Hill for London or Le Marais for Paris: cosmopolitan, charismatic, representative and authentic neighborhoods.

The streets of the Cabanyal are being remodeled by leaps and bounds, and more and more people from all over the world have decided to live there. The reason why it's becoming a multicultural area.

One of the most special attractions of the Cabanyal, are its buildings. Urban art is taking over the largest facades in the nei

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the famous neighborhood of Cabanyal. A neighborhood that is fashionable, a symbol of citizen resistance and which attracts tourists and investors because of its proximity to the sea, its new environment and its prices.
The Cabanyal is reinvented to give itself a new opportunity and become the most authentic jewel of Valencia over the years.

Today, the seafaring side of the city offers a revitalization opportunity with the arrival of new neighbors who intend to make El Cabanyal what is Nothing Hill for London or Le Marais for Paris: cosmopolitan, charismatic, representative and authentic neighborhoods.

The streets of the Cabanyal are being remodeled by leaps and bounds, and more and more people from all over the world have decided to live there. The reason why it's becoming a multicultural area.

One of the most special attractions of the Cabanyal, are its buildings. Urban art is taking over the largest facades in the nei

name: Bedroom of a Pop Star
description:

The space

If you want to buy Art, I can take you to the best Artist's studios, we're all a family. You can also get a one day or two master class depending on your interests (bizantine, antique, impressionist, modern, and contemporary Arts) I can offer you my different courses in audiovisual narration, please inquire if interested.

neighborhood_overview: The best neighbourhood in Valencia, undoubtely. Not the old town full of tourists, not the expensive commercial area, empty during the night, this has always been an alive upper class community, all kind of services provided in the block, from shoe repairing to buying a Harley Davidson! This is a peculiar block with a triangle shape. You can make a quick shopping in the little supermarket, eat, have a drink, taking sunbaths in the square terraces, get a hairdrassing session, new shoes and clothing, make your legs hair removing, a facial cleaning, a massage, your nails,  go shopping antiquities, have a lovely dinner and go to the cinema just walking around my block! If you wish, you may get fancy restaurants just around the corner or two blocks away, as much as you can imagine in this area, or walk a little bit and get to Ruzafa, the artsy headquarters in the city, with a wide selection of food from all over the world.

name: Apart.- Loft en Barrio Carmen Vlc
description:
The space
Maravilloso Loft en el Centro Histórico para estrenar. Primer piso muy luminoso en edificio modernista del 1890. Combina la vigueria de madera del techo con una decoracion moderna. Equipamiento y acabados de lujo.

Es un espacio único tipo loft de 30 metros cuadrados sin incluir el cuarto de baño. Pueden alojarse tres personas con comodidad. Cuenta con una cocina totalmente equipada y comoda a estrenar. Para el descanso tiene una cama doble de 1,50 m y un sofá cama individual de 90 cm.


El loft se situa en pleno corazón del Barrio del Carmen. Cuenta con el encanto de ser uno de los barrios antiguos mas grandes de Europa. Esta plagado de monumentos históricos, arquitectura de todas las épocas desde medieval hasta moderna, museos, teatros, mercado de abasto, mercadillos, pequeño comercio de barrio, restaurantes con encanto etc. En definitiva, una gran oferta cultural, de ocio y hostelería.
Como experiencia recomendaría a mis huéspedes
neighborhood_overview: Conocido como Barrio del Carmen, se situa en el Centro Historico de la ciudad. Formado por edificios y construcciones de varias epocas y monumentos historicos de gran belleza dentro de un trazado medieval de callecitas pequeñas y recorridos a pie para el deleite del visitante. En el conviven la poblacion residencial, cada vez mas joven, y la actividad turistica y de hosteleria y pequeño comercio. Es un barrio muy seguro con gran actividad durante todo el dia. El apartamento se situa en una calle bastante tranquila que permite facilmente el descanso.

name: Comfy & handy apartment in Valencia

The vibrant university area is full with great parks, restaurants & coffee bars. Just down stairs (less than 1 minute away by foot) there are 3 different supermarkets, 2 bakeries, 2 banks/ATMs, a pharmacy and much more!

The two bedrooms contain very comfortable form fitting beds and ensuite bathroom
neighborhood_overview: Malvarossa/Cabynal is the Beachfront of Valencia. It is steeped in history and culture. A safe and quiet popular neighborhood with a local vibe it is home to artists, musicians, sailors, gypsies, and expats. We love our neighborhood by the sea!

The space

Originally a duplex with an art studio upstairs, the two spaces were separated when the studio moved out of the city centre. The use of exquisite FSC sourced hardwoods for flooring and wall panelings give the home an extremely warm feeling and make it hard to imagine that you are on the 7th floor.

With a surge in tourism in the last few years you will also find bike and scooter rentals in our very street. Convenient to banks, ATMs, supermarkets, the central Valencia fresh food market and a whole host of landmarks and historical sights mean that you can walk almost everywhere you need to go.

neighborhood_overview: Vecindario Dinámico,Tranquilo y de Confianza. repleto de Galerias de Arte,tiendas de ropa,librerias, supermercados, gimnasios y los mejores restaurantes y bares de moda de la ciudad

name: Wide room, with wifi & breakfast
description:
Apartamento de tres habitaciones (una privada), cocina amplia, gran salón comedor, baño completo y aseo. Suelos de parquet. Aire acondicionado frio/calor en salón y habitación principal. Calefacción en todas las dependencias.

The space
Apartamento de tres habitaciones (una privada), cocina amplia, gran salón comedor, baño completo (con bañera jacuzzi) y aseo. El baño y el aseo son comunes a todas las habitaciones. Suelos de parquet. Aire acondicionado frio/calor en salón y habitación principal. Calefacción en todas las dependencias.
2 habitaciones dobles, muy amplias y luminosas con camas de matrimonio.
Situado en una calle peatonal. Cerca de la Ciudad de las Artes y las Ciencias (1,5 km), del Centro Histórico de la Ciudad (1,5 km), zona de copas y restaurantes (Barrio de Ruzafa a 1 km - para el que le quede ganas de salir por la noche), así como disfrutar de los jardines del río Turia con más de 10 Km que atraviesan la ciudad

Guest access
neighborhood_overview:
La zona es muy tranquila. Tiene un polideportivo con piscina cubierta, pistas de paddle, campo de fútbol, gimnasio, etc. y varios jardines en los alrededores.
Esta muy próximo a la Ciudad de las Artes y las Ciencias y al centro histórico de la ciudad.

name: Wide & luminous apartment with breakfast
description:
Apartamento de tres habitaciones, cocina equipada, amplio salón comedor, baño completo (con bañera jacuzzi) y aseo de cortesía. Suelos de parquet. Aire acondicionado frío/calor en salón y habitación principal. Calefacción en todas las dependencias.

The space
Dos habitaciones espaciosas, con camas de matrimonio y grandes armarios y una habitación con dos camas individuales.
Amplio salón comedor, con TV, DVD, equipo musical, mesa de hasta 12 comensales.
Todas las dependencias dan al exterior y son muy luminosas. Pequeño balcón a una calle peatonal.
WIFI fibra óptica alta velocidad.
Moderna cocina con todos los electrodomésticos (lavadora, lavavajillas, nevera, horno, microondas, tostadora, vitrocerámica), vajilla y utensilios de cocina

Other things to note
Deberás avisar con antelación la hora de llegada para que pueda recibirte. Posibilidad de dejar el apartamento mas tarde, si hay disponibilidad. Si esperáis llegar desp
neighborhood_overview:
Es una zona tranquila (excepto en fallas), con jardines, polideportivo municipal con piscina cubierta climatizada, pistas de paddle, campo de fútbol, gimnasio, etc.
Está próximo del centro de la ciudad y del casco antiguo así como del río y de la Ciudad de las Artes y las Ciencias. (1,7 kilómetros, 20-25 minutos andando).

name: WIFI central cozy flat in old town
description:
Our cool and comfortable one bedroom apartment with exposed brick and lot of natural light has a true city feeling! It comfortable fits two and is centrally located on the gothic town, Barrio del Carmen, a few steps to La Lonja or El Mercado Central

The space
Experience the best of Valencian life in this tastefully decorated and furnished apartment, located in the heart of historical and charming center of Valencia: The Carmen, the largest and one of the most beautiful quarters in Europe. From the apartment a net of lovely picturesque pedestrian streets, lead in short walking distances to architectural gems like the "Lonja", (classified World Heritage, by UNESCO), the Central Market which Modernist structure hosts the largest food market in Europe, and the romantic Plaza Redonda.
My home, located on the third floor of a historic building is full of light, colorfully decorated and well-equipped for a short or long stay.
One double bedroom 'country sty
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the central historic Valencia, Barrio del Carmen, very close to well-known Plaza de la Virgen, plaza Redonda, Plaza del Ayuntamiento, Plaza de la Reina, Plaza del Tosal, Plaza del Collao. Also walking distance to Palacio Marques de Dos Aguas, Cathedral, Plaza de Toros, Miguelete, Correos 1920's, Estacion del Norte and Mercat de Colon (modernist masterpieces), Ensanche and Ruzafa art zone.
El Carmen is a lovely neighborhood surrounded by plenty of chic, local craft stores, art galleries, Valencian and international food restaurants, cafes and terraces where shopping, sightseeing, having a drink or tasting tapas forms part of our everyday lifestyle. Five minutes to the river park 'Turia' that takes us onto Calatrava modern architectural masterpieces and then onto the port.

name: casa con encanto,en el centro
description:
casa en el centro de russafa,zona de moda....lugares curiosos,bares con encanto,musica...puedes cojer bus para playa,mercado muy interesante....pero las casa al ser ultimo piso muy tranquilo.estas al lado de la estacion de trenes,terraza interior..estas en el centro de valencia.

The space
Casa antigua...reformada....diafana..con terraza...muebles vintage....con cocina..lavadora...lavavajillas.....cubiertos....lista para cocinar.....detallista....con mucha luz....1 habitacion....sin ruidos ,es el ultimo piso...ladrillo visto..y vigas de madera...ventanales grandes...persianas que tamizan la luz...istalacion de luz ,industrial....obras de varios artistas de la ciudad....

Guest access
Terraza privada... Toda la casa para el disfrute...

Other things to note
Tiene una terraza...que podras comer o cenar...con una mesa...sillas...parasol....ver la televion ....tienes internet....una cama antigua..para relax...
neighborhood_overview: Barrio de moda...pero a la vez tranquilo..con galerias de arte..peluquerias..cafes...mercado todos los dias...supermercados..vintage..colorista y dinamico...alquiler de bicis..autobus a la playa...centrico...

name: Piso en el corazón Russafa-Early/Late Checkin/out
description:
Perfectamente localizado en el corazón del barrio mas a la moda de Valencia: Russafa. A lado de la Estación Norte, metro Xativa y del mercado de Russafa. Una habitación confortable, salón muy grande, luminoso con 5 ventanas, 1 baño y cocina completa. Ideal para parejas con/sin hijos. Aire acondicionado en el salón y habitación. El piso queda a vuestra disposición para todo el dia de salida. LATE CHECK OUT garantizado.

The space
Habitación principal con cama doble, terraza privada y aire acondicionado. Hay un armario y plancha para estirar. Hay también una cuna de viaje que puedo proporcionar gratuitamente.

Guest access
Hay wifi en el piso con una velocidad testada de hasta 100Mb, aire acondicionado en el salón y en la habitación principal. Televisión 32" con canales satelitales. La cocina es completa, con microondas, a disposición de los huespedes.

Other things to note
Los niños hasta 6 años no pagan. Puedo proporcion
neighborhood_overview: Russafa en los últimos años se ha convertido en el barrio mas a la moda de la ciudad de Valencia. A parte la temporada de Fallas, cuando las calles están cortadas y hay gran afluencia de gente, es un barrio maravilloso, muy vivaz lleno de restaurantes españoles e internacionales. Para vivirlo las 24 horas, desde un buen brunch, unas compras en el mercado, hasta la noche cenando es sus decenas de restaurantes e yendo de copas hasta que toque la última canción.

name: De diseño en excelente ubicación
description:
Apartamento en edificio rehabiltado en el corazón del casco histórico de Valencia a 100m de Catedral.
Completamente equipado, Air Acon, TV plana, sofá, balcón, comedor, cocina, horno, microondas, vitrocerámica, nevera, baño completo. WIFI

The space
Apartamento ubicado en un edificio antiguo totalmente rehabilitado. De diseño y con las instalaciones nuevas.

Guest access
Terraza chill out.

Lavadora.
Secadora.

Other things to note
El apartamento y el edificio están pensados para poder disfrutar de las instalaciones tanto por pocos días o para estancias más prolongadas.
neighborhood_overview: El apartamento se encuentra ubicado en el barrio del carmen, en pleno centro histórico de Valencia a pocos metros de la Catedral, Plaza de la Virgen, Mercado Central, Lonja de la seda. A pie se pueden hacer recorridos por las calles y edificios típicos, así como disfrutar de una amplia oferta de bares de tapas, cafeterías y restaurantes con comida valenciana, española e internacional.

name: ApartUP Blue Opera View. WiFi+ A/C + PK + Pool
description:
Spectacular apartment in City of Arts and Sciences overlooking the City of Arts and Sciences. 2 double bedrooms, a gym with sauna, swimming pool, WiFi. Well connected to 10 minutes from the beach and from downtown.

The space
Beautiful apartment overlooking the City of Arts and Sciences in Valencia, located in the heart of it. This allows us to be 10 minutes walk from Ocean Park, Prince Philip, the Hemispheric, the Opera House Reina Sofia museum in Gulliver park ... a pleasant walk along the Turia Gardens, the largest urban garden in Spain.
Area well connected by Bus, Metro, Taxi and Bike Path that brings us in 10 minutes to the beach or the historic city center.
The 105 m2 apartment has 2 bedrooms (one with double bed and one with two single beds). Living room with beautiful views of the City of Arts and Sciences, with sofa bed high quality, so that the total capacity of the apartment is 6 persons. 1 bathroom, 1 shower room and fully equipped kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: District in the best area of Valencia. A very quiet area in lungs of Valencia Turia River Gardens. At 100 meters from the apartment there are all kinds of services, restaurants, shopping centers, etc.

name: Two bedroom flat; centre of Russafa
description:
Bright and airy, spacious two bedroom apartment on a quiet street 100m from Mercado Russafa, and 15 minutes walk from city centre. Fully renovated in August 2014.

Servicio Territorial de Turismo - Valencia - registration number: VT-36435-V

The space
Bright and airy two bedroom apartment on a quiet street 100m from Mercado Russafa, and 10 minutes walk from Estacion del Norte. Also within 10 minutes walk are dozens of cafes and restaurants, from traditional to trendy, most with outdoor seating.
The apartment is the entire top (4th) floor of the building (so there are no noisy neighbours) and gets lots of light and air with windows in every room including both bathrooms. There is a lift.
The apartment is 86 sq. meters (925 sq. feet) and was completely refurbished in June 2014.
There is a large (23 sq. meters) living room with dining area at one end, off which is a spacious well-equipped kitchen with
all-new cabinets and appliances.
neighborhood_overview: Russafa is a very traditional, residential and commercial neighbourhood of Valencia, bristling with small cafes, bars and restaurants.

name: Balcony to the sea
description:
3 bedrooms and balcony front sea apartment
Registration number: AT-34420-A

The space
Location: front beach and close to supermarkets, restaurants, etc.
Light and well ventilated apartment with a balcony overlooking the sea. It has 3 bedrooms and a bathroom
From the corridor just when you enter the apartment you will see the sea through the windows of the living room.
“Balcony to the Sea” apartment is comfortable, tastefully decorated with some oriental environment. Rooms are: one with a double bed, one with twin beds and the third with a single bed.

It has all you need for a pleasant stay: air conditioning, WiFi, washing machine and fully equipped kitchen.

License number
AT-34420-A
neighborhood_overview:
Situated at less than 500 meters from Malvarrosa beach, this apartment is located in a quiet street surrounded by small shops where you will find all you need. A fantastic beach location while it is only a few kilometers of the historical center of Valencia City.
Located just to the north of Valencia’s Port, Malvarrosa beach offers guests nearly 3 kilometers of clean white sand and crystal blue waters. The surrounding area was historically occupied by fishermen and it is currently home to a number of modern developments, offering guests a wide choice of restaurants and cafes. Valencia itself is a vibrant city full of history and culture, from the classic architecture and lively marketplace in the Cathedral quarter to the narrow streets of El Carmen or the ultra-modern City of the Arts and Sciences.

name: The best of Valencia by walk
description:
We want to share with you the best of Valencia. Be one more at home with everything worth doing sightseeing on foot. For us it is VERY IMPORTANT to share with dogs. We have one (age 13) he's in chronic pain and he's getting a little grumpy but is not a bad boy just going to bark at you.
PLEASE NOTE that you are not allowed to cook or use the washing machine if you stay less than 2 weeks, BUT you will have free coffee and tea and also a shelf in the fridge (salads and sandwiches are allowed).

The space
Our first floor flat is well lit with a living room with two balconnies looking down on to a small square.

In your room, you'll have fantastic and comfy bed, a wardrobe and a desk. Your room doesn’t have a street view, neither a balcony (of course you can use one at the living room).

We provide you with towels, shower gel and shampoo.

We'll lend you a Valencia's guidebook. And we'll give you a map, information about the city, a
neighborhood_overview:
Cafes, restaurants, museums, squares and monuments are all around and two minutes walk away is the Mercado Central, a sight in itself, to buy fresh products.

A few streets away the Barrio El Carmen have an intense nightlife.
